articles.author: Amy B Wang
articles.title: Trump suggestion of ‘termination’ of Constitution draws few GOP rebukes - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump’s posts represent an escalation in his attacks on American institutions — one that scholars say must be heeded as a sign of how far he is willing to go to regain power.
articles.content: Donald Trumps suggestion this weekend that the U.S. Constitution should be terminated in response to his baseless claims that the 2020 election was stolen drew a largely muted response from Republica… [+7976 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: The tragedy of avoidable Covid deaths - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Comprehensive new data show just how many Americans died after vaccines became widely available — mostly in less-vaccinated states. | Health
articles.content: Whose pandemic strategy really saved lives? Which states or countries lost the most people to the virus? Or to the unintended consequences of mitigation efforts? Now theres finally some clear, object… [+6716 chars]
